Class TextDocument

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents the text document

        public void backInBlack(int length,
                        int pos)
        (Re-)colors the text starting at the specified position and spanning the specified length in the default color
        Parameters:
        length - the length of text that is colored in the default color
        pos - the position where the text to color starts

      • changeLanguage

        public void changeLanguage(Languages lang)
        Changes this language if no file has been set but saves the specified language to prefs file in any case
        Parameters:
        lang - the language which has one of the constant values in Languages

      • colorSearchedText

        public void colorSearchedText(java.lang.String[] searchTerms,
                              boolean constrainWord)
        Colors in keyword color text elements specified by the array of search terms.

        The method returns with a warning if the current language is not plain text.

        Parameters:
        searchTerms - the array of Strings that contain search terms
        constrainWord - true to color only words
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if searchTerms is null or contains empty Strings
